alert.note: Alert for Brown; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 6:28PM CDT until August 04 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Rock County in north central Nebraska... East central Brown County in north central Nebraska... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Long Pine, or 7 miles southeast of Ainsworth, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Long Pine, Hofeld Lake and Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 164 and 196. Highway 20 between mile markers 242 and 264. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
